right.text: If I was president I would reinstate the Red Scare. Put everyone in their place.

left.text: i love how i come back here and tyrannous is being a dumbass. it really makes my day

right.text: what, do you think i'm a communist? you're wrong

left.text: This 'unpatriotic' stuff isn't strong enough - we have to go back to thinking everyone is a commie.
